name: French Fish Chowder
keywords: dairy-free, nut-free, vegetarian, fish, fish broth, orzo, main course
recipeIngredient: 3/4 pound skinless, boneless halibut or red snapper
1 cup diced red or green pepper
2 sprigs fresh thyme or 1 teaspoon dried
1/4 cup chopped fresh basil or Italian parsley

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan or kettle, and add the onions, celery, garlic and peppers. Cook, stirring, over medium heat, about 5 minutes. Add turmeric, saffron, wine, tomatoes, bay leaf, thyme, pepper flakes, fish broth or water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the orzo, stir well and simmer for 7 to 8 minutes or until the orzo is tender.
Add the fish, stir, bring to a boil and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove the bay leaf, sprinkle with basil and serve with the garlic croutons.
